title: 479 - Another COVID Summer—What’s Changed and What Hasn’t
itunes:title: 479 - Another COVID Summer—What’s Changed and What Hasn’t
description: Kicking off our third pandemic summer looks a lot different than the last two….or does it? With more than five times as many COVID cases as this time last year, have we given up on trying to protect ourselves? What should we be focusing on, and does this mean we’re truly learning to live with COVID? Experts Keri Althoff and Elizabeth Stuart return to the podcast to talk with Stephanie Desmon about where we are this pandemic summer, what’s changed, what hasn’t, and where we might be headed.
